Mod.name: Azoth
Mod.description:
Azoth adds new materials, items, and spells and new uses for old materials based on themes from western alchemy and a general intent to commit crimes against the falling everything engine. Most of the chemistry happens after you burn cinnabar in the coal pits to get some mercury: [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/RQbOTtbUyw1759CdNz/giphy.gif[/img] Mix it with some teleportatium or ambrosia or [i]polymorphine[/i] This is all very dangerous though, so get a vacuum flask to help you get all this hot poison [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/7UWD3jVRVaE3pkfE1Z/giphy.gif[/img] which can be made at the hiisi anvil with a flask of teleportatium [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/GFAnxUvmLthZbzIMRF/giphy.gif[/img] That bag of holding can be found near the lava lake! Put stuff in it! In addition, [i]we've got spells[/i] [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/lHHtaumjcZ8YFkZoun/giphy.gif[/img] [b]SPELLS[/b] [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/qQqecxQkXjtHIYSzm1/giphy.gif[/img] They can attach things to other things [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/pCZP4b70qTXTobQdv8/giphy.gif[/img] and bring back the dead in even more necromanceous ways [img]https://media.giphy.com/media/0YXuWv01lC1X2wkNET/giphy.gif[/img]
That's enough gifs for now, but rest assured, there are [i]also other things[/i]
